name: A Rescue Shelter
description:
Help the dogs find a home. Clean them and scrub them to make sure they are clean, well fed, playful and ready for a new home!

If you want to donate. Do not donate to us.
We would rather have you donate straight to Rescueyhdistys Kulkurit RY in Finland through Paypal to kulkurit@kulkurit.fi

We got our rescue dog through that group, and we wish their action being supported.

Controls On PC
------------------------------------------------

Spacebar to get a new dog to your shelter

Esc to open settings

You can change the language of the game through options.
